about.title: About
about.bio1: Software Engineer with experience in high-complexity and critical projects, working on large-scale solutions for multinational clients in Latin America and North America.
about.bio2: Solid experience in requirements analysis, business rules, backend and frontend development, RESTful API integration, microservices, and system documentation.

exata.title: Development Analyst
exata.description: Development of high-impact projects for multinational companies. Customer Experience Data Platform, ESG Engagement Platform, and Warehouse & Logistics Management Portal.

freelance.title: Software Engineer
freelance.description: Development of full-stack solutions using Go, PHP, and modern technologies for various clients.

setebit.title: Frontend Developer
setebit.description: Development of sports betting system using PHP and Vue.js, focused on performance and user experience.

customerHub.title: Customer Experience Data Hub
customerHub.description: Robust platform acting as a centralized hub for processing, consolidating, and securely sharing sales and service data with third-party organizations.

esg.title: ESG Engagement Platform
esg.description: Dynamic solution to engage teams in achieving ESG goals, aligned with the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

warehouse.title: Warehouse & Logistics Portal
warehouse.description: Complete portal for optimizing storage management, transportation, and delivery, coordinating multiple transport providers.

betting.title: Sports Betting Platform
betting.description: High-performance sports betting system with real-time transaction processing.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative opportunities, or partnerships.
